content.text:
# Draft:List of 20th Century Animation productions

This list of animated feature films consists of animated films produced or released by 20th Century Animation, the animation division of 20th Century Studios, which is owned by The Walt Disney Company.
This list will include Fox Family Films movies (the former name of Fox Animation from 1994 to 1998), Fox Animation Studios films, Blue Sky Studios films and in-house or animated films distributed by 20th Century Animation.
